column2: U.S. top court says 2nd mortgages on 'underwater' homes cannot be voided in bankruptcy WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday handed a win to Bank of America Corp by ruling that a second mortgage on an "underwater" home - one with a mortgage balance exceeding its current value - cannot by voided during bankruptcy.

column2: NetApp CEO Tom Georgens steps down June 1 Data storage equipment maker NetApp Inc  said Tom Georgens had stepped down as chairman and chief executive.
AngloGold in exclusive talks with Newmont on Colorado mine-sources TORONTO/VANCOUVER
column3: June 1 Newmont Mining Corp  is in exclusive talks with AngloGold Ashanti Ltd  as it moves closer toward clinching a deal to buy the African miner's Cripple Creek & Victor gold mine in Colorado

column2: Merck KGaA sees immunotherapy drug holding its own in cancer race FRANKFURT
column3: June 1 The head of Merck KGaA's  healthcare division said she expected its cancer drug avelumab
column5: to be among the first two or three to market in a field of immunotherapy pharmaceuticals that harness the power of the immune system in a range of cancer types.
